articles.title: Israel announces military pause in three Gaza areas to address surging hunger
articles.description: The Israeli military announced it would pause fighting in three populated areas of Gaza for 10 hours a day and open secure routes for aid delivery to address a surge in hunger in the territory. This comes amid international criticism of Israel's conduct in the 21-month war.

articles.title: U.S. President Donald Trump announced a new trade deal with the European Union (EU)
articles.description: President Donald Trump announced a new trade deal with the European Union, setting a 15 percent tariff on most European imports to the U.S. The deal comes as the Trump administration faces criticism for not delivering on promises of '90 deals in 90 days'.

articles.title: Six killed in Haridwar Mansa Devi temple stampede
articles.description: At least six people died and two dozen were injured in a stampede at Haridwar's Mansa Devi temple. Police suspect rumors of an electric shock caused panic, leading to the stampede.
